page.title: 08WELBURY VILLAGE HALL EVENTS
page.content: Apart from the usual annual events there has been an extra effort by Welbury villagers to raise money towards the purchase of the land the village hall stands on and the eventual improvement of the hall. Two ladies ran in the Appleton Wiske 'Fun Run'and were sponsered by every villager.There was a Photographic Exhibition of local life by Jane Greenwell with Afternoon teas provided by the W.I. In the summer months 2 car 'Treasure Hunts'were organised, and a 'Field Party' which consisted of a 'Ploughmans Lunch with beer & wine to drink and various games to keep the children amused.Major & Mrs.Arkwright hosted a 'Sangria Evening'. A 'Race night was held at Appleton Wiske Village Hall.Bets were placed,then we watched a film of the race, then hopefully collected winnings.
